1249730.name: Spacewalk Defender
1249730.description:
Dual-wield high tech weapons to fight off endless and increasingly difficult waves of enemies in this sci-fi VR shooter. Give it your best in an attempt to climb the leaderboards by reaching the highest score out of all players.

Features several different weapons and enemies along with randomly generated waves to make sure that no two games are the same.

Features

  • Randomly generated waves with continuous increase in difficulty.
  • Multiple futuristic weapon types which change based on combo-multipliers.
  • A few different enemy types: Watch out for Kamikazes!
  • Easy to learn, challenging to master: Increase your highscore to climb the ranks!
1249730.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
